definition: (of sound) to never stop/to fall incessantly on the ear/to linger on
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means

sentences.english: Sunlit waterfall spray tumbles into our boat and a chorus of various insects rings in our ears.
sentences.chinese: 陽光下的瀑布水花灑落進小船，蟲鳴聲不絕於耳。

sentences.english: For the last few years we have heard almost constant construction noise around us.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的幾年裏，周圍施工的噪音幾乎總是不絕於耳。

sentences.english: You become overloaded with warnings and eventually just tune them out.
sentences.chinese: 不絕於耳的警告最終使你對它們置之不理。

sentences.english: Therefore, on Acipenser sinensis should be allowed to go on sale the voice also prevalent.
sentences.chinese: 因此，關於中華鱘應允許上市銷售的呼聲也不絕於耳。

definition: variant of 迴響|回响[hui2 xiang3]
tone sandhi/modified tone/(music) to change key/modulation
to turn a blind eye to
lit. bashing sideways and colliding straight on (idiom); to push through shoving and bumping/to barge/to charge around violently
overnight until daybreak (idiom); all night long/day and night
lit. the night-blooming cactus shows once/flash in the pan (idiom)/short-lived
